Content: 03 Officers and 85 Other Ranks serving the 22 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - East (SFHQ-E) carried out a Shramadana campaign in Samudragiri Pichchamal Viharaya at Kuchchveli in order to assist the construction of the new Dagoba on Tuesday (31). The project got underway in response to a request made by the Chief Incumbent, Most Venerable Ahungalle Siri Seela Visudhdhi Maha Nayaka Thero from the General Officer Commanding, 22 Division, Major General Nevil Weerasinghe.
